alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Queen Anne's (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 06 at 8:04PM EDT until April 06 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN KENT...SOUTHEASTERN QUEEN ANNE`S AND NORTHERN CAROLINE COUNTIES... At 804 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Goldsboro, or 13 miles east of Centerville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Dover, Denton, Harrington, Camden, Greensboro, Oakland, Ridgely, Goldsboro, Queen Anne, Woodside, Viola, Jumptown, Hazlettville, Sandtown, Andrewsville, Rising Sun-Lebanon, Wyoming, Felton, Hillsboro and Henderson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
